name: Future Ball
description:
How To Play:

In this game you can SEE THE FUTURE! Click the Fast-Forward button to see view all the traps in the level.

When you are confident that you know where all the traps are, click the play button and navigate the player to the portal trying to block yourself from getting hit by the traps.

To Move your player use WASD or the arrow keys and rotate your shield using the mouse.

You can be hit three times before having to restart the level.

Made everything from scratch, wish I would have spent some more time with the music but it's ok. Hope you all enjoy the game!
